question: Second Jamaat. Normally here in UAE after the first Jamaat is over, people performs another Jamaat. Should we attend the second Jamaat or pray separately if unfortunately we miss the first Jamaat.
answer:
QUESTION
Respected Mufti Sahab, As-Salaamu Alaykum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu. What is the Sharia'h opinion on the second Jamaat in Masajid. Normally here in UAE after the fisrt Jamaat is over, people performs another Jamaat. Should we attend the second Jamaat or pray separately if unfortunately we miss the first Jamaat. Some people say it is better to join the second Jamaat to earn the rewards of Jamaat even if some Faasik (Trimmed beareded, praying with Tie, pants below his ankle, etc.) is an Imam. Whether we should pray behind a permanent Imam with short or trimmed beared. What is the Sharia'h opinion? Jazak Allah. Was Salaam
ANSWER


Share:
Respected Brother-in-Islam

Assalaamu Alaykum Wa Rahmatullaahi Wa Barakaatuhu

Many Fuqahaa (jurists) have stated that it is not permissible to perform a
second Jamaat in the Musjid as that defeats the purpose of the first Jamaat.
However, some Fuqahaa have permitted a second Jamaat out of the Musjid
proper.

One should make every with possible effort in performing Salaat with the
original Jamaat, he may join the second Jamaat performed outside the Musjid
proper behind the Imaam irrespective of his position. Rasulullah
(Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, 'Perform Salaat behind every Faajir
(sinful person).

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
